reviews.review_msg: Oh wow absoultely fabulous. Could you  ask for anyone better. The bomb. Take his class he is so nice and helpful.

Absolutely the best prof Ive ever had. Fair marker, great feedback seeing her in office hours, loves and cares for her students, passionate, knowledgeable, and her dog is the sweetest thing ever. Was engaged the whole 4 hours of the lecture. Shes very personable, and youll love her and her classes.

He definitely has his own style of teaching: lecture heavy, non discussion/group project oriented. Though he is open to questions during class, the nature of his courses are mostly taking notes from what he says during lectures. So if you like this style of teaching, then you are in for a good time. Also his grading criteria are very clear.

Not a class I would take or recommend, was very vague when asked for help. The content was interesting but the way it was delivered was poorly done. He shot down student answers and questions at the beginning of the semester that many stopped participating and the class was 3 hours of him talking. Didn't give clear instructions on assignments.
